join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;room-display-name=FooBar;user-id=2 :someone!someone@someone.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!testing_channel_display_name
send hortbot #foobar [HB] FooBar

send hortbot #foobar [HB] foobar

send hortbot #foobar [HB] FooBar
